text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: pArthaH prApya dhanuHzreSTham akSayyau ca maheSudhI
text.ur: pārthaḥ prāpya dhanuḥśreṣṭham akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī

text.ascii: rathaM dhvajaM sabhAM caiva yudhiSThiram abhASata
text.ur: rathaṁ dhvajaṁ sabhāṁ caiva yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣata

text.ascii: dhanur astraM zarA vIryaM pakSo bhUmir yazo balam
text.ud: धनुरस्त्रं शरा वीर्यं पक्षो भूमिर्यशो बलम्
text.ur: dhanur astraṁ śarā vīryaṁ pakṣo bhūmir yaśo balam

text.ascii: prAptam etan mayA rAjan duSprApaM yad abhIpsitam
text.ur: prāptam etan mayā rājan duṣprāpaṁ yad abhīpsitam

text.ascii: tatra kRtyam ahaM manye kozasyAsya vivardhanam
text.ur: tatra kr̥tyam ahaṁ manye kośasyāsya vivardhanam

text.ascii: karam AhArayiSyAmi rAjJaH sarvAn nRpottama
text.ur: karam āhārayiṣyāmi rājñaḥ sarvān nr̥pottama

text.ascii: vijayAya prayAsyAmi dizaM dhanadarakSitAm
text.ur: vijayāya prayāsyāmi diśaṁ dhanadarakṣitām

text.ascii: tithAv atha muhUrte ca nakSatre ca tathA zive
text.ud: तिथावथ मुहूर्ते च नक्षत्रे च तथा शिवे
text.ur: tithāv atha muhūrte ca nakṣatre ca tathā śive

text.ascii: dhanaMjayavacaH zrutvA dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: dhanaṁjayavacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: snigdhagambhIranAdinyA taM girA pratyabhASata
text.ur: snigdhagambhīranādinyā taṁ girā pratyabhāṣata

text.ascii: svasti vAcyArhato viprAn prayAhi bharatarSabha
text.ur: svasti vācyārhato viprān prayāhi bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: durhRdAm apraharSAya suhRdAM nandanAya ca
text.ur: durhr̥dām apraharṣāya suhr̥dāṁ nandanāya ca

text.ascii: vijayas te dhruvaM pArtha priyaM kAmam avApnuhi
text.ur: vijayas te dhruvaṁ pārtha priyaṁ kāmam avāpnuhi

text.ascii: ity uktaH prayayau pArthaH sainyena mahatA vRtaH
text.ud: इत्युक्तः प्रययौ पार्थः सैन्येन महता वृतः
text.ur: ity uktaḥ prayayau pārthaḥ sainyena mahatā vr̥taḥ

text.ascii: agnidattena divyena rathenAdbhutakarmaNA
text.ur: agnidattena divyena rathenādbhutakarmaṇā

text.ascii: tathaiva bhImaseno 'pi yamau ca puruSarSabhau
text.ur: tathaiva bhīmaseno ’pi yamau ca puruṣarṣabhau

text.ascii: sasainyAH prayayuH sarve dharmarAjAbhipUjitAH
text.ur: sasainyāḥ prayayuḥ sarve dharmarājābhipūjitāḥ

text.ascii: dizaM dhanapater iSTAm ajayat pAkazAsaniH
text.ur: diśaṁ dhanapater iṣṭām ajayat pākaśāsaniḥ

text.ascii: bhImasenas tathA prAcIM sahadevas tu dakSiNAm
text.ur: bhīmasenas tathā prācīṁ sahadevas tu dakṣiṇām

text.ascii: pratIcIM nakulo rAjan dizaM vyajayad astravit
text.ur: pratīcīṁ nakulo rājan diśaṁ vyajayad astravit

text.ascii: khANDavaprastham adhyAste dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: khāṇḍavaprastham adhyāste dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: dizAm abhijayaM brahman vistareNAnukIrtaya
text.ur: diśām abhijayaṁ brahman vistareṇānukīrtaya

text.ascii: na hi tRpyAmi pUrveSAM zRNvAnaz caritaM mahat
text.ud: न हि तृप्यामि पूर्वेषां शृण्वानश्चरितं महत्
text.ur: na hi tr̥pyāmi pūrveṣāṁ śr̥ṇvānaś caritaṁ mahat

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: dhanaMjayasya vakSyAmi vijayaM pUrvam eva te
text.ur: dhanaṁjayasya vakṣyāmi vijayaṁ pūrvam eva te

text.ascii: yaugapadyena pArthair hi vijiteyaM vasuMdharA
text.ur: yaugapadyena pārthair hi vijiteyaṁ vasuṁdharā

text.ascii: pUrvaM kuNindaviSaye vaze cakre mahIpatIn
text.ur: pūrvaṁ kuṇindaviṣaye vaśe cakre mahīpatīn

text.ascii: dhanaMjayo mahAbAhur nAtitIvreNa karmaNA
text.ur: dhanaṁjayo mahābāhur nātitīvreṇa karmaṇā

text.ascii: AnartAn kAlakUTAMz ca kuNindAMz ca vijitya saH
text.ur: ānartān kālakūṭāṁś ca kuṇindāṁś ca vijitya saḥ

text.ascii: sumaNDalaM pApajitaM kRtavAn anusainikam
text.ur: sumaṇḍalaṁ pāpajitaṁ kr̥tavān anusainikam

text.ascii: sa tena sahito rAjan savyasAcI paraMtapaH
text.ur: sa tena sahito rājan savyasācī paraṁtapaḥ

text.ascii: vijigye sakalaM dvIpaM prativindhyaM ca pArthivam
text.ud: विजिग्ये सकलं द्वीपं प्रतिविन्ध्यं च पार्थिवम्
text.ur: vijigye sakalaṁ dvīpaṁ prativindhyaṁ ca pārthivam

text.ascii: sakaladvIpavAsAMz ca saptadvIpe ca ye nRpAH
text.ur: sakaladvīpavāsāṁś ca saptadvīpe ca ye nr̥pāḥ

text.ascii: arjunasya ca sainyAnAM vigrahas tumulo 'bhavat
text.ur: arjunasya ca sainyānāṁ vigrahas tumulo ’bhavat

text.ascii: sa tAn api maheSvAso vijitya bharatarSabha
text.ur: sa tān api maheṣvāso vijitya bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: tair eva sahitaH sarvaiH prAgjyotiSam upAdravat
text.ur: tair eva sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ prāgjyotiṣam upādravat

text.ascii: tatra rAjA mahAn AsId bhagadatto vizAM pate
text.ur: tatra rājā mahān āsīd bhagadatto viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: tenAsIt sumahad yuddhaM pANDavasya mahAtmanaH
text.ur: tenāsīt sumahad yuddhaṁ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: sa kirAtaiz ca cInaiz ca vRtaH prAgjyotiSo 'bhavat
text.ur: sa kirātaiś ca cīnaiś ca vr̥taḥ prāgjyotiṣo ’bhavat

text.ascii: anyaiz ca bahubhir yodhaiH sAgarAnUpavAsibhiH
text.ur: anyaiś ca bahubhir yodhaiḥ sāgarānūpavāsibhiḥ

text.ascii: tataH sa divasAn aSTau yodhayitvA dhanaMjayam
text.ur: tataḥ sa divasān aṣṭau yodhayitvā dhanaṁjayam

text.ascii: prahasann abravId rAjA saMgrAme vigataklamaH
text.ur: prahasann abravīd rājā saṁgrāme vigataklamaḥ

text.ascii: upapannaM mahAbAho tvayi pANDavanandana
text.ur: upapannaṁ mahābāho tvayi pāṇḍavanandana

text.ascii: pAkazAsanadAyAde vIryam Ahavazobhini
text.ur: pākaśāsanadāyāde vīryam āhavaśobhini

text.ascii: ahaM sakhA surendrasya zakrAd anavamo raNe
text.ur: ahaṁ sakhā surendrasya śakrād anavamo raṇe

text.ascii: na ca zaknomi te tAta sthAtuM pramukhato yudhi
text.ud: न च शक्नोमि ते तात स्थातुं प्रमुखतो युधि
text.ur: na ca śaknomi te tāta sthātuṁ pramukhato yudhi

text.ascii: kim IpsitaM pANDaveya brUhi kiM karavANi te
text.ud: किमीप्सितं पाण्डवेय ब्रूहि किं करवाणि ते
text.ur: kim īpsitaṁ pāṇḍaveya brūhi kiṁ karavāṇi te

text.ascii: yad vakSyasi mahAbAho tat kariSyAmi putraka
text.ur: yad vakṣyasi mahābāho tat kariṣyāmi putraka

text.ascii: arjuna uvAca
text.ur: arjuna uvāca

text.ascii: kurUNAm RSabho rAjA dharmaputro yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: kurūṇām r̥ṣabho rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: tasya pArthivatAm Ipse karas tasmai pradIyatAm
text.ur: tasya pārthivatām īpse karas tasmai pradīyatām

text.ascii: bhavAn pitRsakhA caiva prIyamANo mayApi ca
text.ur: bhavān pitr̥sakhā caiva prīyamāṇo mayāpi ca

text.ascii: tato nAjJApayAmi tvAM prItipUrvaM pradIyatAm
text.ur: tato nājñāpayāmi tvāṁ prītipūrvaṁ pradīyatām

text.ascii: bhagadatta uvAca
text.ur: bhagadatta uvāca

text.ascii: kuntImAtar yathA me tvaM tathA rAjA yudhiSThiraH
text.ud: कुन्तीमातर्यथा मे त्वं तथा राजा युधिष्ठिरः
text.ur: kuntīmātar yathā me tvaṁ tathā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: sarvam etat kariSyAmi kiM cAnyat karavANi te
text.ur: sarvam etat kariṣyāmi kiṁ cānyat karavāṇi te
